tax_terms.modelo_303_tooltip: Quarterly VAT return. Filed in April, July, October and January.
tax_terms.modelo_130_tooltip: Quarterly income tax prepayment. 20% of net profit, filed same dates as Modelo 303.
tax_terms.cuota_ss_tooltip: Monthly Social Security contribution paid to Seguridad Social (RETA system).
tax_terms.iva_repercutido_tooltip: Output VAT — the VAT you charge clients on your invoices.
tax_terms.iva_soportado_tooltip: Input VAT — the VAT you pay on your business expenses.
tax_terms.base_imponible_tooltip: Net amount before VAT is added.
tax_terms.autonomo_tooltip: Self-employed / freelancer status in Spain. Requires registration with Hacienda and Seguridad Social.
tax_terms.hacienda_tooltip: The Spanish Tax Agency (Agencia Tributaria / AEAT). Manages VAT and income tax.
tax_terms.gestor_tooltip: A Spanish accountant/tax advisor. Recommended for official tax filings.
tax_terms.tarifa_plana_tooltip: Flat-rate Social Security scheme for new freelancers: €80/month for the first 12 months.
tax_terms.irpf_tooltip: Personal income tax. Withheld at 15% on most professional invoices.
tax_terms.estimacion_directa_tooltip: Standard income tax calculation: actual income minus actual deductible expenses.
tax_terms.tipo_general_tooltip: Standard VAT rate — 21%. Applies to most professional services.
tax_terms.tipo_reducido_tooltip: Reduced VAT rate — 10%. Applies to transport, hospitality, residential construction.
tax_terms.tipo_superreducido_tooltip: Super-reduced VAT rate — 4%. Applies to basic foods, medicines, books.
tax_terms.exento_tooltip: VAT exempt — no VAT charged or deductible. Applies to regulated education, healthcare, residential rental.

tax_verdicts.general_21: Standard rate 21% — applies to all services and goods not covered by reduced rates.
tax_verdicts.reducido_10: Reduced rate 10% — hospitality services, passenger transport, residential construction works.
tax_verdicts.superreducido_4: Super-reduced rate 4% — basic foods, medicines, books and newspapers.
tax_verdicts.exento: VAT-exempt transaction under Art. 20 Ley 37/1992. Input VAT cannot be deducted.
tax_verdicts.deducible_100: 100% deductible — expense directly linked to professional activity.
tax_verdicts.deducible_50_vehicle: 50% deductible — vehicle. Maximum deductible unless exclusive professional use is proven (Art. 95.Tres LIVA).
tax_verdicts.deducible_30_home: 30% deductible — home utility. Percentage of floor space used for work (Art. 30 Ley 35/2006 IRPF).
tax_verdicts.no_deducible: Not deductible — personal expense not linked to professional activity (Art. 28 Ley 35/2006 IRPF).

common.disclaimer_tax: Indicative only. Always consult your accountant for official filings.
